title: Cabbage potato and bean soup
ingredients: ['1 dessertspoon vegetable oil', '385g peeled potatoes, cubed', '125g celery, thinly sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '425g cabbage, finely chopped', '1 litres chicken stock', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 (420g) tin baked beans and sausages, sausages chopped']
